Criteria: All hikers must be able to maintain a minimum pace of two miles an hour for a minimum of two hours. All hikers must have cold weather gear and be experienced above treeline in winter conditions.

All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability as outlined by this website.

Near Alton Bay
Alton Bay, NH 03810

• Descend by walking away from the view (in a westerly direction) to get onto Brook Trail.
• Follow Brook Trail, keeping to the right as you pass two trail junctions on the upper part of the mountain.
• Brook Trail will flow straight into Mount Major Trail/Main Trail which will return you to the parking lot, 2.4 miles from the summit.

Trailhead: Parking lot is on the left hand side or Route 11 just 4.2 miles north of the town of Alton Bay. There is a sign on route 11.

Trailhead is on the back right side of the parking lot if you are facing the mountain. There is a small trail on the left back side of the parking lot but this is not the trail for Mt Major. (Lat:43.50396 Lon:-71.29729)

We will be hiking up Mt. Major via the main trail. This trail is 2.4 miles long one way and should take us approximately 1:30 to reach the summit. Upon reaching the summit we can make a decision as a group on whether or not to take the Major/Straightback link over to Straightback mountain. This would add approximately an additional 3 miles round trip to the hike. Therefore total distance would be approximately 7.8 miles and should take approximately 6 hours to accomplish.

In my opinion, Mt. Major offers some of the best views for a minimum smount of hiking.

Even though this is a relatively low elevation mountain, expect to encounter cold weather conditions. Dress appropriately!! Snowshoes are generally not required, since this is a often used trail. Foot traction devices are generally not required, but are strongly encouraged in case icey conditions are encountered.

Trailhead: Parking lot is on the left hand side or Route 11 just 4.2 miles north of the town of Alton Bay. There is a sign on route 11.
